channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoho Flow -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoho Flow -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47334|2024-10-09T13:18:59.575Z -- zoho%20flow -- zoho%20flow%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Zoho Flow Zoho Flow for WordPress allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Zoho Flow for WordPress: from n/a through 2.7.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-47334|2024-10-09T10:42:32.939Z -- zoho%20flow -- zoho%20flow%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Zoho Flow Zoho Flow for WordPress allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Zoho Flow for WordPress: from n/a through 2.7.1.
